pinyin: Ji1 du1 jiao4 Min2 zhu3 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: Zaiyi advised to kill the foreigners and fight against the foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 主張殺洋人，殺教民，與外國開戰。

sentences.english: I believe in God and try to be a good member of my parish.
sentences.chinese: 我信仰上帝，努力成爲教區的好教民。

sentences.english: He needed his congregation to feel justified in mistrusting all white people.
sentences.chinese: 他想讓他的教民通過不相信全部白人來感到公平。

sentences.english: I'll discover the parish of that parishioner.
sentences.chinese: 我會找到這個教民所屬的教區。

definition: mulberry farming/to grow mulberry for sericulture
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
foreign religion (esp. Western Christianity in Qing China)
ignorant masses/to keep the people in ignorance
to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)
to encourage and supervise (esp. state officials promoting agriculture)
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture in China/followers or clan of Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
